column4: I'm looking for a piece of web development software, preferably for GNOME rather than KDE - but I'm not that picky. the only thing I really would want is the function to work on a remote system. Anyone got any recommendations for me?
i used to use gphpedit or kate
if you install the kate editor you should just be able to dump an ftp address into the open file window & it will connect
OK, cheers - I'll give that a try tonight
